channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dolphins Part Ways With GM Chris Grier; HC Mike McDaniel Reportedly Safe
item.description: The Grim Reaper has come for a long-term member of the Miami Dolphins' front office. General manager Chris Grier and the organization have agreed to part ways, the team announced Friday morning. The Dolphins are now 2-7 on the season following Thursday night's 28-6 loss to the Baltimore Ravens.
